00019 GAMESS::GAMESS(System::String^ filename, Model^% model)
00020 {
00021         SystemModel=model;

00024     FormatName="GAMESS";

00028 /**
00029 * @brief Main function for opening and reading file
00030 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00031 */
00032 bool GAMESS::LoadFile(void)
00033 {
00034         String^ Command=gcnew String("");
00035         bool  OK = true;
00036 
00037         //Turn off Refreshing for faster importing
00038         AtomCollection->Refreshing=false;
00039 
00040 
00041         //Initializing flags to false, meaning that no any frame was yet read
00042         read_onceOR=false;
00043 
00044 
00045         //Read the file until the end of it and as long flag OK is true
00046         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream  && OK )
00047         {
00048 
00049                 Command= ReadLine() ;
00050 
00051                 //Reading different sections of the file according to keywords-phrases
00052                 if(OK)
00053                 {
00054                         //Read coordinates
00055                         if(Command->Contains(CMD_CARTCOORD))
00056                         {  
00057                                 OK=read_CARTCOORD();
00058                                 read_onceOR=true; //read at least once
00059                         }
00060                 };
00061 
00062                 //Wrong format inside senctions
00063                 if(!OK)  throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading File in Line "+LineCount+".") ;
00064         };
00065 
00066         // Check if file is a valid GAMESS format, having at least one of the sections
00067         if(!(read_onceOR )) return false;
00068 
00069         //Turn on again Refreshing which causes calculation of bonds
00070         AtomCollection->Refreshing=true;
00071         ReadingFile->Close();
00072         return true;
00073 }
00074 
00075 /**
00076 * @brief Main function for reading coordinates from the file
00077 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00078 */
00079 bool GAMESS::read_CARTCOORD()
00080 {
00081         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00082         int AtomID=1;                                           //Saving the atom ID
00083 
00084         //Readin initial dummy lines
00085         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00086         //COORDINATES OF ALL ATOMS ARE (ANGS)
00087         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00088         //ATOM   CHARGE       X              Y              Z
00089         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00090         //------------------------------------------------------------
00091 
00092 
00093         fileline="";
00094 
00095         while ((fileline=ReadLine())->Length>2 )
00096         {
00097                 //Number of Fields: 5, Isotope index: 0, XYZ index: 2,3,4
00098                 ExtractIsotopeAndCoordinates(fileline, FormatName, read_onceOR, AtomID,
00099                         5, 0, 2, 3, 4, 1.0, AtomCollection);
00100         };
00101 
00102         return true;
00103 
00104 }
